meanings.sent1: The old, abandoned house on the hill was the cursedest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The pirate ship was the cursedest vessel to sail the seven seas.
meanings.sent3: The cursedest black cat in the neighborhood always brought bad luck to those around it.
meanings.sent4: The cursedest hour of the night was when the howling wind echoed through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The cursedest land in the kingdom was said to be where the dark wizard's tower stood.

meanings.sent2: The traitor's actions were the cursedest betrayal his friends had ever witnessed.
meanings.sent3: The cursedest student in the class was the one who always cheated on tests.
meanings.sent4: The cursedest decision he made was to trust the deceitful merchant with his savings.
meanings.sent5: The cursedest path to take was the one that led straight into the heart of the haunted forest.

meanings.definition: Most severely afflicted or troubled by a curse
meanings.sent1: The cursedest family in the village was rumored to be haunted by vengeful spirits.
meanings.sent2: The cursedest soul in the graveyard was said to be the restless spirit of the witch.
meanings.sent3: The cursedest day of the year for him was always Friday the 13th.
meanings.sent4: The cursedest moment of the battle was when the hero's sword shattered into pieces.
meanings.sent5: The cursedest fate for the cursedest man was to wander the earth alone for eternity.
